name: ghostd
text: good rating only because Ray felt he needed to watch Santa dance pantless.

name: wurlitzergirl
text: I can't believe this only got a 3.5. Panel 2 is pure GOLD.

name: zapatos
text: I work at a gold mine, that stuff isn't special anymore.

name: mustakrakesh
text: That's because your club isn't named Haunches.

name: zapatos
text: Actually its because I see fat dudes doing the twist-n-shout most every morning.

name: mustakrakesh
text: Delicious!

name: shutup_shutup
text: Also, he had apparently forgotten about this fact, judging by Panel 3.

name: centipede_damascus
text: The waitresses at Haunches all wear short shorts and are constantly dropping their pencils.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ferdinand, DerSquirrel, Darthemed)

name: jesler729
text: No.

name: deancain29
text: yes!

name: satellitetv
text: Hi!

name: qatipay
text: Ray: not yet a breast man.

name: m3funkyb
text: "work it in out"?

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, rowboat, cellphonedick, Jesus, Wulvaine, Direhaggis, jmmfgd, Mastronaut, dr_sexlove)

name: honesttom
text: I favour the former explanation, although the latter is equally possible.

name: i_love_kate
text: I believe we've been over the use of the abbreviation "'Stad".

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, farqussus, Wulvaine, Direhaggis, rumblefish, tellumo)

name: farqussus
text: No. Next it'll be "The 'Stad". And that is fucked.

name: daily
text: Or perhaps 'work it IN/out' is funnier than 'work it on out.'  That could be an explanation.

name: carten
text: Or it could be that "The 'Stad" missed the o by a key.

name: zzzleepy
text: i agree with the alt text.  have you ever heard a story end well after starting "so we went to this strip club"?

name: selbencoirlo
text: only when it ends right there, just all awkward trailed off silence but you know that somebody got their bone on.

name: snowman
text: My girlfriend and I kissed for the first time in a strip club (and no she was not working there)

name: zapatos
text: Same thing, but she does work there now.

name: farqussus
text:
Downtown folks frown upon no-pants Santas.

Difficlut to say, and possible Onion headline.

name: straw
text: I just said that outloud three times, thanks.

name: snowman
text: Seriously.  What a GREAT sentence.

name: direhaggis
text: Roast Beef is afraid that Ray's santa will offend downtown unless it has pants.

name: tekende
text: It will cause problems in the community!

name: l_c_b
text:
FATBUXX
Check Cashing
=====24 hours

I swear I saw one of those dingy little check-cashing places with a name like FATBUXX once...the sort of name that adds to the overall reek of seedy desparation you find at the worst sorts of those places

name: qwertycat
text: right next to a massage parlor (chinese) and bookie joint (italian).  looks like my neighborhood if my neighborhood didn't have liquor stores.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Damn, every time I think of Santa he will not have any pants on.

name: carlyle
text: Was that playing Jerk it Out by the Ceasars, or were those actual lyrics from Twist and Shout (I have only ever heard the Twist and Shout part of that song)
